description_localized.en:
90-sq-foot (8-sq-meter) room with city views

Internet - Free WiFi
Entertainment - Digital channels
Food & Drink - Coffee/tea maker
Bathroom - Partially open bathroom, free toiletries, and a shower
Practical - Iron/ironing board (on request)
Comfort - Daily housekeeping
Need to Know - No cribs (infant beds) or rollaway/extra beds available
